description: Replace existing carpet flooring and base with new heavy traffic vinyl flooring and base at the RCMP Comox Valley detachment.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) for RCMP Comox Valley Flooring Replacement
#### Tender Reference Number: WS4256106160
#### Date of Publication: 2023-10-12
#### Closing Date: 2023-10-26T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the replacement of the existing carpet flooring and base with new heavy traffic vinyl flooring and base at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Comox Valley Detachment located at 800 Ryan Rd Courtenay, BC V9N 7T1.

**Issuing Authority:**
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Solicitation Details:**

* Solicitation Number: WS4256106160
* Publication Date: 2023-10-12
* Closing Date: 2023-10-26T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-22
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

**Scope of Work:**

The project includes replacing the existing carpet flooring and base with new heavy traffic vinyl flooring and base. All personnel engaged in the execution of the work must have at a minimum, the requisite RCMP Facility Access Level 2 (FA2) clearance.

**Requirements:**

* The Contractor must prepare and submit all requisite forms and documents for all personnel engaged in the project and submit them to RCMP to obtain RCMP FA2 clearance upon contract award.
* The scope of the project must be completed within six (6) weeks upon official notification of acceptance of offer.
* All existing furniture in the scoped areas and rooms will be moved to the provided storage located outside the building and reinstalled once construction is complete for each phase.

**Contact Information:**
- Contact Person: Allison, Rodnie (SPAC/PSPC)
- Contact Email: rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
